GZWHD

TO BE WITH YOU

GZWHD is committed to creating elegant and delicate jewelry for women. It keeps up with fashion trends and transforms various trend elements into beautiful and practical jewelry to meet the diverse needs of modern women. Fashion design and high quality make GZWHD a popular brand.

Main Stone Quantity：16 Pieces

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：2 mm

Side Stone Quantity:32 Pieces

bracelet Length ：18+3cm/7″+1″

A SPECIAL GIFT FOR A ROMANTIC MOMENT

This teardrop jewelry set is unique and elegant, it is an ideal gift for wife/lover/girlfriend/mother/daughter/friend/sister/bride/bridesmaid and yourself on Anniversaries/Valentine’s Day/Mother’s Day/Birthday/Wedding/Christmas/Thanksgiving Day.

Open/Adjustable Ring

The open ring size can be freely adjusted from size 6 to size 11, you can adjust it until it fits your finger perfectly.

Extended Bracelet

The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).You can make it fit your wrist by attaching and detaching the extension section freely.

Necklace Introduction

The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”, This means you can choose any length between 17.7″-19.7″(45cm-50cm).This necklace is attached with a lobster clasp. It is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely.

Sealed Gift Box

We pack and ship each jewelry set in a sealed jewelry box. It is perfect as a gift to send directly to wife/lover/girlfriend/friend/sister/mom/bride/bridesmaid on anniversary/valentine’s day/birthday/mother’s day/Christmas day

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.15 x 1.97 x 1.02 inches; 1.59 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 4, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09PNBZTKP

MATERIAL: This jewelry set is platinum plated alloy, nickel-free, lead-free, non-allergic, and highly polished. The main stone is a 12mm*16mm (pendant) and 10mm*14mm (earrings and ring) waterdrop created-ruby, and the side stones are multiple inlaid round cubic zirconia. The bracelet contains 16 oval created-ruby and 32 round white cubic zirconia.
ABOUT SIZE: The size of the open ring can be adjusted from size6 to size11. The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”(45cm+5cm). The necklace connected by lobster clasp,and it is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely. The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).
ITEMS YOU WILL GET: A ring, a pair of earrings, a pendant and necklace set, a bracelet, and a gift box.
QUALITY ASSURANCE: These jewelry are brand new, and they will be double-checked before sending, we will check every part of the whole set of jewelry to ensure that they are working properly and without any defects. We provide a 60-day unconditional refund service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:58 UTC – Details)

From the brand

IUGA Activewear

IUGA Activewear

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.23 x 8.03 x 1.69 inches; 9.14 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 12, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09FJX1NMX

Imported
Pull On closure
Hand Wash Only
Ultra-soft material- Crafted in soft, breathable, stretchy fabric, IUGA tennis dress provides maximum soft touch& feel. These tennis dresses gently hug every curve of your body with slight tummy control. The moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool in a workout and daily wear.
Customize your fit- The women dress is designed with adjustable straps that accommodate a wide range of body shapes. Also, it features a built-in bra equipped with removable pads for the support you need.
Built-in shorts- The IUGA workout dress is a lightweight and stretchy A-line mini dress with shorts underneath for coverage. Flat seams keep the shorts feeling smooth against your skin with two side pockets for holding a tennis ball and your phone.

IUGA Summer Dresses for Women 2022

When considering the workout gear, you would most likely come up with leggings and sports bras. This season, however, it’s all about the workout dress. What makes the IUGA Women dresses worth your money is not just its remarkable features but also its fantastic look.

Adjustable Straps for Your Personalized Fit

The tennis dress features adjustable straps and a stylish X-back design.

Built-in Shorts Liner

There’s a built-in romper liner that ensures you can move in any way you like.

2 Side Pockets

Built-in shorts with 2 side pockets that are big enough to comfortably fit a smartphone.

Removable Pads

Tennis dress featuring built-in bras is equipped with removable pads for the support you need.

Read more

The slimmer-fitted cut curves provide you with a modern and elegant look. The anti-wrinkle fabric and the 4-way stretch quality ensure the enhanced movement of your body while working out. Furthermore, moisture-wicking features keep the sweat and heat away from your body and keep it cool and fresh.

Whether you’re playing a round of golf or making a quick run to the grocery store, you’ll look super stylish in this stretchy exercise dress. Wear it solo or layer under a jacket with sneakers for a streetwear look.

At IUGA, we believe Yoga is a practice that encompasses all aspects of life, not just the physical, but also includes philosophy, breath and spirituality. It’s not just about who has the best body or who could do the most advanced poses, but it’s also about living life in a certain way. Ultimately, it is all about the way you approach your life and the world around you.

Summer Shirts
High Impact Sports Bras
